attributes.action: In addition to the tax disc have a disc for insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have to display our tax disc to show we have paid for car tax, why not have a disc for Car Insurance, it is compulsory to have car insurance so why not display that fact. There are too many drivers that get away with driving with no insurance that insurance premiums keep increasing. If it was a requirement to display proof of insurance the same way as proof of Taxing our cars then I feel less people would try and drive uninsured.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
